News.Title: Blue Pebble: Q4 Results Show 107% Revenue Growth, 5% Final Dividend Declared
News.Summary: Blue Pebble reported a 107% year-on-year increase in revenue for FY25, reaching ₹45.66 crore. The company proposed a final dividend of ₹0.50 per share. New Design & Build and Digital Immersive divisions contributed significantly to revenue growth. Despite positive results, the stock was locked in a 5% lower circuit on the NSE.
